[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1586442245374{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-top: 180px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}” el_class=”overflow gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583411856909{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}” el_class=”left-col-mob”][vc_column_text el_class=”m-b-0″ css=”.vc_custom_1611175601186{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Agency Revenue Rockstars Live Q&A

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1611170518301{margin-bottom: 15px !important;}”]

Featuring Sheena Graham of REAS Marketing

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1588878863914{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][easy-social-share buttons=”twitter,linkedin,facebook,mail” counters=0 style=”icon” template=”37″ size=”xs” point_type=”simple”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ el_id=”passedEvent-column”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1583364273895{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron” el_id=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Want to hear how other agencies are rockin’ revenue?

During this deep-dive Q&A with SharpSpring CMO Chip House and REAS Marketing agency founder Sheena Graham, you’ll learn how she’s grown her agency over the past three years.

Chip and Sheena riff about her agency’s:

  • Success focusing on niche industries
  • Approach to business development
  • Client case studies
  • Plans to keep revenue rising in 2021

[/vc_column_text]

Your hosts:

[vc_row][vc_column]

Sheena Graham

Agency Founder, REAS Marketing

Sheena is a talented, results-oriented marketing professional with a proven record of planning and coordinating complex marketing automation campaigns. Sheena loves a challenge and brings a great deal of personal care and positive creativity to the solutions she provides her clients. Sheena’s career began in the education industry, but she was drawn to the complexities of marketing automation. Her work ethic is her greatest strength – as a consultant, and on the weekends, as a “soccer mom”.read more...

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column]

Chip House

CMO, SharpSpring

Chip House is CMO at SharpSpring. A well-known executive in the email marketing industry, Chip has extensive experience with organizational development and go-to-market strategies in early- to mid-stage B2B SaaS companies. At SharpSpring, Chip drives strategy for the marketing team, leading content, lead generation, marketing operations and more.

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”]
A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a comprehensive sales and marketing platform, similar to HubSpot and Marketo…except we’re different because we’re the only company built specifically for agencies.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1583360124979{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]
Trusted by more than 2,000 agencies

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”209119″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625777412448{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1611176216542{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}” el_class=”m-t-minus-15-percent hide-cta” el_id=”register”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”stop”][vc_column][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_id=”sticky-mobile-button”][vc_column]
